info.name: Facebook - dA Emoticons
info.description: This style replaces the default FB emoticons in messages, chat and comments with emoticons from deviantArt. It's a remake of an abandoned style written by JohnTuley.
info.additionalInfo: "Pacman" emoticon by nirman. "Glasses" emoticon by Usei. "Devil" emoticon by Droneguard. "Innocent" emoticon by JCRiddler. Unfortunately, the style does not work for the emoticons in a status message itself, just in status comments. While most emoticons are span-elements with unique classes, the emoticons in the status messages are i-elements, and for some stupid reason FB changes their classes frequently.
